info.title: Nano Banana API
info.description: OpenAI-compatible API for AI-powered image generation, editing, and upscaling. Supports multiple Imagen models with advanced customization options.

get.description: Retrieve available models for image generation, editing, and upscaling.

post.description: Create a new image from a text prompt. Supports multiple models including Nano Banana and Google Imagen series.

example.prompt: A serene mountain landscape at sunset

get.description: Create a new image from a text prompt using query parameters.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Text description of the image to generate
parameters.example: A serene mountain landscape at sunset

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of images to generate (1-4 for Imagen models)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Image size as dimensions (e.g., 1024x1024) or aspect ratio (e.g., 16:9)

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

post.description: Modify an existing image based on text instructions. Accepts image as file upload, URL, or base64 string.

example.prompt: Add a rainbow in the sky

get.description: Modify an existing image using query parameters. Image must be provided as URL.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Text instruction for editing the image
parameters.example: Add a rainbow in the sky

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: URL of the image to edit

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

post.description: Increase image resolution using AI upscaling. Supports 2x and 4x upscale factors.

get.description: Upscale an image using query parameters.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: URL of the image to upscale

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

prompt.description: Text description of the image to generate
prompt.example: A serene mountain landscape at sunset

n.description: Number of images to generate (1-4 for Imagen models)

size.description: Image size as dimensions (1024x1024) or aspect ratio (1:1, 3:4, 4:3, 9:16, 16:9)

quality.description: Image quality level. 'high' and 'hd' produce 2K images.

response_format.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

prompt.description: Text instruction for editing the image
prompt.example: Add a rainbow in the sky

image.description: Image as URL or base64 string

response_format.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

prompt.description: Text instruction for editing the image
prompt.example: Add a rainbow in the sky

response_format.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

image.description: Image as URL or base64 string

response_format.description: Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.
Format of the response. 'url' returns a temporary URL (valid for 24 hours), 'b64_json' returns base64-encoded image data.

url.description: URL of the generated image (when response_format is 'url'). Valid for 24 hours.

revised_prompt.description: The prompt used or enhanced prompt returned by API
revised_prompt.example: A serene mountain landscape at sunset with golden light

error.message: Upstream API error: 500 - Internal server error

tags.name: Images
tags.description: Image generation, editing, and upscaling operations
